T02TD1457E:5a-0: @5a ` // dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i man ngag bzhugs /
T02TD1457E:5a-2: # // dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1457E:5a-3: rang bzhin rnam dag gnyis kyis rgyu byas pas //
T02TD1457E:5a-4: brgyad po 'jig rten pa dang thun mong ste //
T02TD1457E:5a-5: lnga nyid spang bya lnga nyid lam yang yin //
T02TD1457E:5a-6: dag byed ngo bo sems kyi rang bzhin sku //
T02TD1457E:5a-7: bsam mi khyab pa'i rtog pa rang la 'byung //
T02TD1457E:5a-8: bzhi dang bral te gsum du rtog tu med //
T02TD1457E:5a-9: dag byed rang bzhin dag pa'i dang du snang //
T02TD1457E:5a-10: gnyis po spangs te la nyid lam du bya //
T02TD1457E:5a-11: lnga la mi chags glang chen smyon pa 'dra //
T02TD1457E:5a-12: ku sha rlung bskyod spyod 'di bdag la gces //
T02TD1457E:5a-13: sha 'u sar pa 'dra bar gso ba 'di //
T02TD1457E:5a-14: kun la gces pa yin zhes ri khrod gsung //
T02TD1457E:5a-15: ma rtogs rtogs pa'i spyod pa smyon pa 'dra //
T02TD1457E:5a-16: rtogs nas mi spyod blun po'i spyod pa yin //
T02TD1457E:5a-17: gang yang mi rtog de yi dang la gzhag / grol bar 'gyur te de nyid the tshom med //
T02TD1457E:5a-18: gsum po spang bar gyis shig rang la ltos //
T02TD1457E:5b-0: dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i man ngag bdag byin gyis @5b brlab pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD1457E:5b-1: ri khrod pa chen po'i gsung rje mi nyag lo ts'a bas bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
